Where You Gonna Stick that Cap?

14 Nov 2011

So far there have been about 50 photos posted to the Hypenotic Facebook page featuring Beau’s Beer lovers cuddling up to their favourite guy. Together Beau’s and Hypenotic want to raise $2000 for Not Far From the Tree. That means we need to see 1000 photos on the Facebook page featuring you and the Barry Bottle Cap.

Word is those bottles are going to go fast, so you’ve got about a month to get it done.

Get out to your local LCBO location (Lug Tread is available here and Night Marzen is here) and get yours today.

We look forward to seeing where you stick it!

About us

Hypenotic is a marketing strategy, design & development firm that chooses to use its powers for good. We’re a certified founding member of B Corp in Canada, and if you don’t know what that is, it’s time you do. Since ’98, we’ve helped a lot of interesting people do important things. We create relevant communications and useful experiences. Find out more.
